backupTips.title: Backup Mnemonic
backupTips.description: Mnemonic is the only way to recover your wallet, please keep it safe

privacy.title: Ensure Privacy
privacy.description: View mnemonic in a private environment to prevent others from peeking

noScreenshot.title: No Screenshots
noScreenshot.description: Do not save mnemonic electronically, write it down instead

safekeeping.title: Safe Storage
safekeeping.description: Keep mnemonic in a safe place, loss will result in unrecoverable assets

areYouSureYouWantToSkipBackup: Are you sure you want to skip backup?
doNotDiscloseOrShareTheMnemonicPhraseWit: Do not disclose or share the mnemonic phrase with others.
ifYouLoseYourMnemonicPhraseYourAssetsAre: If you lose your mnemonic phrase, your assets are lost forever.
enterTheMnemonicSeparatedBySpaces: Enter the mnemonic, separated by spaces
clickOnTheWordsToArrangeThemInMnemonicOr: Click on the words to arrange them in mnemonic order.
theMnemonicsAreSeparatedBySpacesAnd_12_1: The mnemonics are separated by spaces, and 12/15/18/21/24/36-bit mnemonics in Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and English are supported. Just enter the passwords of Bioforest Chain directly

inTheNextStepYouCanSeeTheMnemonicWordsUs: In the next step, you will see the mnemonic words
thisIsYourMnemonicGetTheMnemonicToOwnThe: This is your mnemonic. Get the mnemonic to own the wallet asset! Please write it down on paper and keep it in a safe place.
transactionPasswordLoseTips: Note: Once the transaction password is successfully set, it cannot be retrieved if it is lost!
pleaseKeepInMindAfterSettingTheTransacti: Please keep in mind after setting the transaction password
clickHereToQueryTheTransferProgressThrou: Click here to check transfer details in blockchain explorer.

whenTurnesOnYouCanUseYourFingerprintInst: When turned on, the fingerprint lock will be enabled
theIdentityIsNotBackedUpYouCanOnlyExitAf: The identity is not backed up, you can only exit after the backup is completed.
